name: Bay Area Environmentally Aware Consulting Network
description:
Join BEACN – UC Berkeley's Premier Sustainability and Social Impact Consulting Organization!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recruiting for Fall 2025 | More Information (Coming Soon) at: www.beacn.org/join

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

About BEACN: BEACN is UC Berkeley's premier business consulting organization focused on sustainability and social impact. Founded in 2006, we've worked with 119 unique clients, including leading Fortune 500 firms, non-profits, government agencies, and startups. Our diverse community spans all 7 academic colleges at UC Berkeley, representing 10+ countries, 20+ U.S. states, and various backgrounds—all united by a shared mission to drive sustainability and innovation, and to make the world a better place.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

What We Do: Every semester, BEACN partners with five organizations on high-impact, real-world projects. As a member, you'll join one of five dynamic project teams as a consultant alongside 4-5 other consultants, led by two project managers, and advised by a graduate student mentor and BEACN's executive board. Our projects are diverse in scope and vary based on member interest each semester, but can include things like:

  • Engineering Research: Determining the energy efficiency of different battery types and proposing an electrification plan for client's vehicle fleet
  • Geospatial Data Analysis: Evaluating the impacts of racial disparities in public transit access, and proposing revised transit routes for client to maximize access, minimize pollution, and optimize traffic flow
  • Sustainable Policy Development: Delivering policy memos for legislative officials
  • Marketing Strategies: Formulating go-to-market plans for innovative greentech products
  • Financial Modeling: Assessing the financial viability of client's planned solar energy expansion efforts

Learn more about our past projects at www.beacn.org/services.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Professional and Personal Growth: Beyond project work, you'll become part of BEACN's vibrant community, making lifelong friends and enjoying:

  • Destination retreats
  • Big-little pairings and mentorship
  • Professional development workshops 
  • End-of-semester banquets
  • Frequent socials, from arts and crafts on the glade to Halloween parties and team dinners—all at no cost to you!

Additionally, as one of UC Berkeley's oldest professional groups, BEACN boasts a powerful alumni network with over 300 graduates working in leading organizations across consulting, tech, finance, public agencies, startups, and nonprofits. Our alumni have also continued their education at prestigious institutions such as Harvard, Oxford, MIT, and Cambridge. Joining BEACN connects you to this extensive, close-knit network, opening doors to incredible professional opportunities across a multitude of industries.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why Join? No prior consulting or business experience is needed—we provide comprehensive training to ensure your success in project work. BEACN also offers need-based stipends to support students facing financial hardships. We strongly encourage students of all backgrounds, experiences, and skill sets to apply!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Contact Us: For any questions, reach out at info@beacn.berkeley.edu.

Connect with BEACN: beacn.org | instagram.com/cal.beacn
summary: BEACN is a student-run sustainability and business strategy consulting organization. Focused on sustainability & social impact, BEACN has worked with 119 unique clients, including leading Fortune 500 firms, non-profits, government agencies, and startups.
